Ayanda Khumalo

"IT'S ADN" (Previously known by the stage name Adrenaline) is a soulful Hip-Hop artist originally from the city of Bulawayo, Zimbabwe and currently based in Pretoria, South Africa. The diverse powerhouse of an artist is a 23-year old law student/Promotional model/ rapper/ songwriter & 1/2 of and co-founder of the hit making "Dirty Diamonds" Duo.

His Instagram Page has over 1000+ followers.
